overview: Josh Kerben, founder of Nebrek Designs. He looks forward to working with you! Nebrek Designs is a privately owned business that strives to make each and every one of our customers as satisfied as possible. We are located in the Metropolitan New York area. We have been providing friendly and professsional e-commerce solutions since 2000. Not in the New York area? Doesn’t matter! Thanks to the new digital world of computers, we can work together easily no matter the distance.
